welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mixco, Guatemala! Get ready to experience the charming blend of colonial architecture, vibrant markets, and stunning natural landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our wonderful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Cabaña Suiza
restaurants.description: Cabaña Suiza is a swiss restaurant located in Mixco.
restaurants.address: Km 20.8 Carretera a San Lucas Sacatepequez, Mixco
